Declaration.EWayBills:
<#list tr.eWayBills as eWayBill>
			
				${eWayBill.orderId}
				I
				${eWayBill.entRecordNo}
				${eWayBill.entRecordName}
				${eWayBill.wayBillNo}
				1
				发货
				${eWayBill.freight}
				${eWayBill.freightCurr}
				${eWayBill.valuationFee}
				${eWayBill.valuationFeeCurr}
				${eWayBill.netWt}
				${eWayBill.grossWt}
				${eWayBill.num}
				${eWayBill.goodInfo}
				${eWayBill.recipientName}
				142
				${eWayBill.recipientProvincesCode}
				${eWayBill.recipientDetailedAddress}
				${eWayBill.recipientPhone}
				${eWayBill.shipperName}
				142
				440101
				广东省广州市花都区广州机场综合保税区汇通天下仓库
				020-61150313
				${eWayBill.noticeNo}
			
		</#list>
